full_title: scared of my guitar by Olivia Rodrigo
title: scared of my guitar

description.plain:
in a recent youtube video “Olivia Rodrigo – GUTS (call for your free consultation!)” – during a glitch in the display of the confirmed tracklist that included 12 songs, 4 unreleased tracks appeared. “scared of my guitar” is track 14 for Olivia’s upcoming GUTS (Deluxe). the date of the release for GUTS (Deluxe) is yet to be confirmed.

In Olivia’s song “scared of my guitar” she’s dealing with mixed feelings in a relationship. On the surface, everything seems great, and her partner treats her well. But deep down, she’s uncertain and anxious. She tries to distract herself from these feelings and makes excuses for them, thinking it’s just temporary confusion. She is using music as a way to face her true feelings.

embed_content: Read “scared of my guitar” by Olivia Rodrigo on Genius

body.plain:
in a recent youtube video “Olivia Rodrigo – GUTS (call for your free consultation!)” – during a glitch in the display of the confirmed tracklist that included 12 songs, 4 unreleased tracks appeared. “scared of my guitar” is track 14 for Olivia’s upcoming GUTS (Deluxe). the date of the release for GUTS (Deluxe) is yet to be confirmed.

In Olivia’s song “scared of my guitar” she’s dealing with mixed feelings in a relationship. On the surface, everything seems great, and her partner treats her well. But deep down, she’s uncertain and anxious. She tries to distract herself from these feelings and makes excuses for them, thinking it’s just temporary confusion. She is using music as a way to face her true feelings.
